apiMessage.fetchError: An error occurred while data is taken
apiMessage.postError: An error has occurred while data is sent
apiMessage.badRequest: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.
apiMessage.forbidden: You do not have access rights to the content.
apiMessage.notFound: The server can not find the requested resource.
apiMessage.internalServerError: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle.

token.getError: An error occurred while taking the Token
